p: In this study, marrow-containing beef bones ( Os femur and Os humerus) were used to obtain the bone broth as a raw material and they were purchased from local a butcher. The whey protein isolate (moisture, protein, fat and ash content of 3.75, 93.4, 0.57, and 1.82% respectively) and the MD (<20 DE) as carrier agents were purchased from Kavi Food Co. (Hardline Nutrition, Istanbul, Turkey). The WPI and MD were used as received.
